Header: Special traffic plan surrounding Independence Square from today
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st):- A special traffic plan has been enacted surrounding Independence Square from today (February 01) till the 03rd of February. The traffic plan is in line with the 72nd Independence Day Celebrations. The plan will be enacted from 6.00 am on the following days. The police said that roads will be closed from the Glass House junction towards Nanda Motors, from the Library Junction to Glass House and the entrance to the Ananda Kumaraswamy Mawatha. In addition, entering the F. R. Senanayake Mawatha, from the Dharmapala Mawatha, entering into the Kannangara Mawatha from the Soysa Roundabout and entering into the Kannangara Mawatha from Wijerama Mawatha through Rosmead Place will also be blocked. The police said that during the rehearsal period, vehicle travel from Bauddhaloka Mawatha to the Maitland Place and Premakeerthi De Alwis Mawatha will also be halted. Further entry to the Foundation Mawatha from the Stanley Wijesundara Mawatha has been halted. On the day of the Independence day celebrations too the traffic plan is due to be enacted.
